		Question: who was stephen r covey
		Answer:
answer: Stephen Richards Covey was an American author, speaker, and businessman. He was best known for his book The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People, which has sold over 25 million copies worldwide. Covey was also the author of several other books, including First Things First, Principle-Centered Leadership, and The 8th Habit. He was a co-founder of the FranklinCovey Company, a leadership training and consulting firm. Covey died in 2012 at the age of 79.
